Based on the user's preferences and cues, I would recommend the movie "Blow Out" from this list: ["Blow Out", "Smokin' Aces", "Jumper", "Unleashed"].
The movie "Blow Out" tells the story of a sound recordist who accidentally records evidence that proves a car accident was actually murder. As a result, he becomes the target of several individuals who want him dead.
One of these individuals is a Las Vegas performer turned snitch named Buddy Israel. When Buddy decides to turn state's evidence and testify against his mobsters, he realizes that not only does he want to survive this ordeal but he also wants to make sure that no one else is going to be targeted like him.
In order to achieve this goal of making sure no one else is targeted like him, Buddy has to first find out who among the mobsters are responsible for the car accident that led to the murder. Once Buddy finds out who among the mobsters are responsible for the car accident that led to the murder, he has to then figure out how he can convince these mobsters that what happened in the car accident was actually murder and not just some sort of misunderstanding or accidental collision.
